content.raw:
Automated or manually?

Use the sqlite3 command line tool for a manual check. If `.read` doesn't print an error then the SQL syntax is correct.

```
$ sqlite3 /tmp/test.db
SQLite version 3.11.0 2016-02-15 17:29:24
Enter ".help" for usage hints.
sqlite> .read tools/record/schema/0.1.0.sql

sqlite> .tables
message_types  messages       migrations     topics       
sqlite> .headers on
sqlite> .mode column
sqlite> select * from migrations;
id          from_version  to_version  time_utc           
----------  ------------  ----------  -------------------
1                         0.1.0       2017-12-11 16:22:21
sqlite> 
```

An automated test can be covered by a test for the record tool. Record will need to use the schema when creating a new database.
